item.title: CVE-2022-23071|2024-09-17T02:16:41.615Z -- recipes -- recipes
item.description: In Recipes, versions 0.9.1 through 1.2.5 are vulnerable to Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF), in the “Import Recipe” functionality. When an attacker enters the localhost URL, a low privileged attacker can access/read the internal file system to access sensitive information.
